name: bridgingloansonline
short_description:
Project Developers seeking Bridging Loan Finance apply to Pipip to list their Development Project, we then carry out the Project due diligence to ensure that it meets our stringent requirements and is suitable for offering to our investors.

Each project is clearly described on-line. For each Development Project finance is secured from multiple investors through a reservation system, via our streamlined process the investor reserves their position, then purchases shares in a company which holds first charge on the property being developed.

Only when sufficient capital is allocated do Pipip carry out company formation, share allocation, secure a legal charge on the development property and carry out the capital transfers. Investors maximise their security by lending across multiple Development Projects.
